meanings.definition: The state of being incomplete or unfinished.
meanings.sent1: The incompletenesses of the puzzle left me puzzled.
meanings.sent2: She felt frustrated by the incompletenesses in her project.
meanings.sent3: The incompletenesses of the cake made it look like modern art.
meanings.sent4: His story had so many incompletenesses, it felt like reading a mystery novel.
meanings.sent5: The incompletenesses of the plan made it difficult to follow.

meanings.sent1: The incompletenesses of the painting left the artist dissatisfied.
meanings.sent2: The incompletenesses in his explanation raised more questions.
meanings.sent3: The incompletenesses of the joke made it fall flat.
meanings.sent4: Her incompletenesses in understanding the topic were like missing pieces of a puzzle.
meanings.sent5: The incompletenesses of the song lyrics made it hard to sing along.
